Package peregrine.io.chunk

Code for dealing which chunks (which are fragments of partition files).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ChunkFile Used for chunk file manipulation (both local and remote).
ChunkReader Interface for reading data from a chunk in key/value form.
ChunkWriter Write key/values to chunks.
 

Class Summary
ChunkEntry Allows us to store an Struct in a chunk file by length prefixing it with a varint.
ChunkReference Read data from a partition from local storage.
CompositeChunkReader An interface to work with mulitple ShuffleInputChunkReaders when doing chunk sorting.
DefaultChunkReader Default ChunkReader implementation which uses mmap, and supports features like CRC32, etc.
DefaultChunkWriter Write key/value pairs to a given file on disk and include any additional metadata (size, etc).
LimitedChunkReader Complies with the ChunkReader interface but the results are bounded so that you can only read `limit` items from the underlying delegate reader.
 

Package peregrine.io.chunk Description

Code for dealing which chunks (which are fragments of partition files).
